definition: to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: He isn't on the run from the Cobol Corporation.

sentences.english: Xiu Han Dynasty by Wang Mang to kill this golden rooster lead the way by which name.

sentences.english: After the people of Israel left Egypt, Pharaoh regretted and pursued the people of Israel with his army.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人出埃及後，法老後悔而帶領軍兵去追殺。

sentences.english: Also you can outrun him to the runes and chase better for a kill.
sentences.chinese: 同時你能比他跑的快去拿符和追殺。

sentences.english: Why is John going to high school if he has terminators after him?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼約翰在有終結者追殺的情況下仍要去高中入學？

sentences.english: Germany doesn't want to be involved in the deadly hunt for the Taliban.
sentences.chinese: 所以，德國不想趟追殺塔利班這趟渾水。

sentences.english: What enemies pursue Tesla and Helen into the catacombs beneath Rome?
sentences.chinese: 在羅馬底下的地下墓穴裏追殺特斯拉和海倫的敵人是？

sentences.english: Yalom suffered werewolf kill, came to the palace to her sister has left here.
sentences.chinese: 亞隆遭遇狼人追殺，前來王宮勸姐姐妲已離開此地。

sentences.english: They hid Jews in their home to protect them from the Nazis.
sentences.chinese: 他們把納粹藏在家裏，保護他們免受納粹的追殺。

sentences.english: Pretty soon Jennifer is being stalked by the mysterious killer.
sentences.chinese: 很快，珍妮芙被追殺的神祕殺手。

sentences.english: The zealots ' charge ability allows it to more easily chase down and destroy the slower-moving mauraders.

He has now been held up to be pursued killing.
sentences.chinese: 他現在已成了追殺的目標。

sentences.english: Just holding one makes you a target for murder.
sentences.chinese: 擁有一樣物件，能令你成爲追殺目標。

sentences.english: He returned in his car after curfew and attempted to run them down.
sentences.chinese: 在宵禁開始之後他回到他的汽車裏並追殺過來。

sentences.english: Saul chased after David, so he started life of outlawry.
sentences.chinese: 大衛被掃羅追殺，所以開始逃難的生涯。
